name: Honeycomb! (BETA)
description:
A simple clicker game where you race against the clock to get as many hexagons as possible!

The higher the value of the selected hexagons, the more is added to your score - but watch out, they can die on you!

Click to select or deselect a hexagon, or hold down Ctrl / Command and drag the mouse to select groups. The game ends when all hexes are dead, or have been selected.

The space bar pauses the game!


People are having download issues. Please comment if you can't download the file!


BETA UPDATE:

The game now rewards you with extra points for clicking individual hexagons!

New UI everywhere! And a splashscreen?!

It tracks your scores (for the current session only)!

Additional polish, performance improvements and bugfixes (including an exploit that allowed for infinite time).
